parameters.query:
-- MVP: SesiÃ³n simple sin Redis
SELECT 
  id,
  customer_phone,
  session_state,
  cart_data,
  context_data,
  expires_at
FROM customer_sessions
WHERE customer_phone = $1
  AND expires_at > NOW()
ORDER BY updated_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

-- MVP: CategorÃ­as simples
SELECT 
  id, 
  name, 
  icon_emoji,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE category_id = c.id AND is_available = true) as product_count
FROM categories c
WHERE is_active = true
ORDER BY sort_order, name
LIMIT 10;

-- MVP: BÃºsqueda simple de productos
SELECT 
  p.id, 
  p.name, 
  p.price, 
  p.stock_quantity,
  c.name as category_name
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id
WHERE p.is_available = true
  AND p.stock_quantity > 0
  AND (
    $1 = '' OR 
    p.name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' OR 
    p.brand ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
  )
ORDER BY p.popularity_score DESC, p.name
LIMIT 10;

-- MVP: Actualizar sesiÃ³n
INSERT INTO customer_sessions (
  customer_phone,
  session_state,
  cart_data,
  context_data,
  expires_at
) VALUES (
  $1, $2, $3::jsonb, $4::jsonb, NOW() + INTERVAL '2 hours'
)
ON CONFLICT (customer_phone) 
DO UPDATE SET 
  session_state = EXCLUDED.session_state,
  cart_data = EXCLUDED.cart_data,
  context_data = EXCLUDED.context_data,
  expires_at = EXCLUDED.expires_at,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id;
